item.title: Passive Recon(OSINT) Resources
item.description: Passive Reconnaissance To gather intelligence without actively engaging the target. This is a list of tools which use passive reconnaissance techniques(E.g., OSINT, etc) to gather information on the target. ⚠️ Some resources may contain techniques that act outside passive reconnaissance and may actively engage the target.
item.dc:creator: Matt Raupfer
